message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with computer vision and graphics, specifically the task of transferring textures from clothing images to 3D garments. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves 3D modeling and rendering, which falls under cs.GR (Computer Graphics). The use of machine learning techniques for learning the mapping from pixels to 3D garment surface suggests the possibility of cs.MM (Multimedia) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) as relevant sub-categories. Finally, the paper's focus on virtual try-on and generation of 3D humans with varied textures suggests the possibility of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as a relevant sub-category.
